    Publications

    • Modelling and validation of an industrial optical spray combustion chamber using OpenFOAM

      J. Alopaeus. (2024). "Modelling and validation of an industrial optical spray combustion chamber using OpenFOAM." Aalto University.

    • Bayesian optimization of in-situ adaptive tabulation for marine engine CFD simulations

      D. Virokannas. (2024). "Bayesian optimization of in-situ adaptive tabulation for marine engine CFD simulations." Aalto University.

    • Simulation and validation of an internal combustion engine under motored condition using OpenFOAM

      B. Shrestha. (2023). "Simulation and validation of an internal combustion engine under motored condition using OpenFOAM." Aalto University.

    • Design optimization of an ethanol heavy-duty engine using Design of Experiments and Bayesian Optimization

      B. Tekgül, I. Liu, M. Vittal, R. Schanz, J. Blumreiter, B. Johnson, G. Magnotti. (2022). "Design optimization of an ethanol heavy-duty engine using Design of Experiments and Bayesian Optimization." ASME Internal Combustion Engine Division Fall Technical Conference.

    • Fast reactive flow simulations using analytical Jacobian and dynamic load balancing in OpenFOAM

      I. Morev, B. Tekgül, M. Gadalla, A. Shahanaghi, J. Kannan, S. Karimkashi, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2022). "Fast reactive flow simulations using analytical Jacobian and dynamic load balancing in OpenFOAM." Physics of Fluids.

    • Large-eddy simulation of diesel pilot spray ignition in lean methane-air and methanol-air mixtures at different ambient temperatures

      S. Karimkashi, M. Gadalla, J. Kannan, B. Tekgül, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2022). "Large-eddy simulation of diesel pilot spray ignition in lean methane-air and methanol-air mixtures at different ambient temperatures." International Journal of Engine Research.

    • Large-eddy simulation of split injection strategies in RCCI conditions

      B. Tekgül, S. Karimkashi, O. Kaario, H. Kahila, É. Lendormy, J. Hyvönen, V. Vuorinen. (2022). "Large-eddy simulation of split injection strategies in RCCI conditions." Combustion Theory and Modelling.

    • Numerical studies for diesel spray assisted methane ignition at low temperature conditions

      B. Tekgül. (2020). "Numerical studies for diesel spray assisted methane ignition at low temperature conditions." Doctoral Dissertation.

    • Large-eddy simulation of spray assisted dual-fuel ignition under reactivity-controlled dynamic conditions

      B. Tekgül, H. Kahila, S. Karimkashi, Z. Ahmad, O. Kaario, E. Lendormy, J. Hyvönen, V. Vuorinen. (2021). "Large-eddy simulation of spray assisted dual-fuel ignition under reactivity-controlled dynamic conditions." Fuel.

    • Large-eddy simulation of tri-fuel combustion: Diesel spray assisted ignition of methanol-hydrogen blends

      M. Gadalla, J. Kannan, B. Tekgül, S. Karimkashi, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2021). "Large-eddy simulation of tri-fuel combustion: Diesel spray assisted ignition of methanol-hydrogen blends." International Journal of Hydrogen Energy.

    • DLBFoam: An open-source dynamic load balancing model for fast reacting flow simulations in OpenFOAM

      B. Tekgül, P. Peltonen, H. Kahila, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2021). "DLBFoam: An open-source dynamic load balancing model for fast reacting flow simulations in OpenFOAM." Computer Physics Communications.

    • A numerical performance study of a fixed-bed reactor for methanol synthesis by CO2 hydrogenation

      D. Izbassarov, J. Nyari, B. Tekgül, E. Laurila, T. Kallio, A. Santasalo-Aarnio, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2021). "A numerical performance study of a fixed-bed reactor for methanol synthesis by CO2 hydrogenation." International Journal of Hydrogen Energy.

    • DLBFoam: An open-source dynamic load balancing model for fast reacting flow simulations in OpenFOAM

      B. Tekgül, P. Peltonen, H. Kahila, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2021). "DLBFoam: An open-source dynamic load balancing model for fast reacting flow simulations in OpenFOAM." Computer Physics Communications.

    • Large-eddy simulation of tri-fuel ignition: diesel spray-assisted ignition of lean hydrogen–methane–air mixtures

      J. Kannan, M. Gadalla, B. Tekgül, S. Karimkashi, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2021). "Large-eddy simulation of tri-fuel ignition: diesel spray-assisted ignition of lean hydrogen–methane–air mixtures." Combustion Theory and Modelling.

    • Large-eddy simulation of dual-fuel spray ignition at different ambient temperatures

      B. Tekgül, H. Kahila, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2020). "Large-eddy simulation of dual-fuel spray ignition at different ambient temperatures." Combustion and Flame.

    • Large eddy simulation of diesel spray–assisted dual-fuel ignition: A comparative study on two n-dodecane mechanisms at different ambient temperatures

      J. Kannan, M. Gadalla, B. Tekgül, S. Karimkashi, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2020). "Large eddy simulation of diesel spray–assisted dual-fuel ignition: A comparative study on two n-dodecane mechanisms at different ambient temperatures." International Journal of Engine Research.

    • Large-eddy simulation of ECN Spray A: sensitivity study on modeling assumptions

      M. Gadalla, J. Kannan, B. Tekgül, S. Karimkashi, O. Kaario, V. Vuorinen. (2020). "Large-eddy simulation of ECN Spray A: sensitivity study on modeling assumptions." Energies.

    • A large-eddy simulation study on the influence of diesel pilot spray quantity on methane-air flame initiation

      H. Kahila, O. Kaario, Z. Ahmad, M. Ghaderi Masouleh, B. Tekgül, M. Larmi, V. Vuorinen. (2019). "A large-eddy simulation study on the influence of diesel pilot spray quantity on methane-air flame initiation." Combustion and Flame.
